data.title: Far more fun than expected!
data.text: This was my first time visiting an escape room and I didn't know what to expect.  When we got there I was afraid the whole thing was just going to be too silly and/or easy.  Neither of those were the case and our group had a ton of fun!  We didn't make it out but we were close, and we definitely intend to go back some day.

data.title: Teamwork makes the dream work!!
data.text: A really good experience that includes teamwork and problem solving. Great for couples and friends!!

data.title: Just do it!
data.text: I took my 12 year old daughter and 10 year old niece and we made it to the final step of the "Taken" room.  They are very bright and focused, so they did a great job!  It was a blast and I will definitely go back for the other rooms when I can.

data.title: SO much fun!!
data.text: Mystery Escape Rooms in Conway is amazing. My Fiancé tried to escape last Friday night and didn't make it out in time. But it was so fun, intriguing, and mind blowing that we had to come back 4 days later and try a different room! This time, we made it out with 27 seconds to spare. If you're looking for something that gets you off the couch and gets your brain waves going, DEFINITELY TRY MYSTERY ESCAPE ROOMS. It is incredibly fun. I know we'll be going again!

data.title: Amazing!
data.text: We had three people go into the escape room, not too few and not too many. The experience included A LOT of brain power, cooperation between players and focus. The event takes an hour to complete--if you can finish it!

data.title: EXCELLENT
data.text: This was our first time ever doing a escape room and it won't be our last! The staff were incredible and super sweet! Awesome experience.

data.title: Great entertainment!!!
data.text: Took a group of teenage girls for a birthday celebration. We did the bank room.  They loved it. Didn't solve but got to the 3rd room. Would highly recommend!!

data.title: So much fun!
data.text: We had so much fun. We booked this as a fun summer outing for our kids and their friends, never expecting to have so much fun with them. It was great to see everyone work together, though we didn't escape.  We're all still talking about it.

data.title: An awesome, family-friendly experience!
data.text: We went not knowing really what to expect....so, from a completely unbiased point of view, this was a fantastic experience!! Very well organized, friendly staff and nice facility! We rocked as a team in the Serial Killer room and earned 4th place! (Team Hellscream!) We will definitely be going back soon to try the other rooms!

data.title: Not what I expected
data.text:
It was better!!! The idea of an escape the room type of thing was not at all appealing to me... and then I experienced it. Sure, I personally only solved one puzzle. But my friends solved every other puzzle. We ran out of time on the last one and needed maybe 30 extra seconds. We had a blast. If we were in one room for too long, there was help and the guy who was helping us, was really really funny and friendly. We wanted to go back for serial killer but couldn't because of work. I gave this rating a 4/5 because it was a little pricey. 
It would be cool if we could watch a video of us trying to solve each room. Maybe a time lapse type of thing. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to try something unique.

data.title: Terrible
data.text: Overpriced, the rooms do not have an order, it is just a cluster when you are in there.  My experience was not very good.  I don't recommend it to anyone.

owner_response.author: Clay S, Public Relations Manager at Escape Mystery Rooms, responded to this review
owner_response.text: David J.  We are sorry to hear that you didn't enjoy your experience. As you can see that is not normally the case and our customers overwhelmingly enjoy their experiences.   We have checked the roster, the ticket sales, and our waiver files and are unable to locate when you were here to experience our room.  We would love to know more information on that so we can address any problems with the staff.  We see you are brand new to tripadvisor.  We take customer service seriously and would be happy to have you back.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Freaking awesome!!
data.text:
We had a blast at the bank job escape. We didn't make it. But it was awesome.  So we decided to try the New serial killer escape room and it was Absolutely Incredible.  Even better that we made it out with 14 seconds left to spare.   If you want fun. This is the place for sure.   Will always go back for new rooms that's for sure.  
.

data.title: Fun - if it's what you're expecting
data.text: These "puzzles" would be better described as a series of party games, juvenile and incomplete in many cases.  If you go expecting intellectual stimulation or outside-the-box scenarios, you'll be sorely disappointed. If you go expecting to do some party games after drinks, with friends, it's a blast - albeit for $25/person. The gamemasters create a great environment, though, and might've been the best part. If it was about half the price, would recommend to a friend or consider going back for different rooms.

data.title: AWESOME EXPERIENCE!
data.text: Amazing place, wonderful people and management, very helpful and understanding. This place adds so much to Conway and so excited for the new room! If you're ever in Conway, You HAVE to try it! It's a must!

data.title: AWESOME EXPERIENCE!!!
data.text: Looking for something to do with friends? This is the best thing to do in Conway! I absolutely love the staff and environment!

data.title: EXCELLENT LOVE IT
data.text: Amazing please go if you have any sense left in you. Fun rooms and if you have no idea what's going on just go anyways because I had no idea what it was.

data.title: So great!
data.text: This is our second time and we absolutely love it! A fun way to spend the evening, great and friendly owners, and a great deal. We will do this over and over again!

data.title: Challenging and fun!
data.text: Great surprise birthday gift. Very interesting and challenging! Had a terrific time trying to pull off the great bank heist...unfortunately we needed a couple more minutes to succeed...but had great time trying..laughed hard...a must do!!

data.title: Birthday Night Out
data.text: This place is awesome! It was my first time there and I enjoyed it very much! The people that run it are very sweet and they do everything they can to make your experience  fulfilling! The price is not bad and experience is awesome! I would highly recommend if you're looking for something to do!

data.title: Leader of the Galaxy
data.text: My daughter and I had an incredible time!  Only 1 lock away from completely solving the mystery,  oh well.  Great times to be had by all!
